channel.title: Please Help Me! (Shops)
channel.description:
Hello i added a shop yesterday and i added items in it... but how i change the price to buy it for? like now is whip 8mill... please help me...
- Meele

item.title: Please Help Me! (Shops)
item.dc:creator: @bobbie1990 bobbie1990
item.description:
@bobbie1990 wrote:

[quote=“koopa king, post:4, topic:284733”]Item.cfg

Search the ID of the item you want to change (Whip is 4151 I believe)
You will see the name of the item and the examine information, and then the 3 numbers to the right of that, change those to what you want it to be. First number is buy price, second is sell price, third is alch value.[/quote]

I have changed it and complied the server but it dont change in game… Please help me

  • Meele

Read full topic

item.title: Please Help Me! (Shops)
item.dc:creator: @koopa_king koopa king
item.description:
@koopa_king wrote:

Item.cfg

Search the ID of the item you want to change (Whip is 4151 I believe)
You will see the name of the item and the examine information, and then the 3 numbers to the right of that, change those to what you want it to be. First number is buy price, second is sell price, third is alch value.
